title: I didn´t get my RP
body:
My username are Wolkens
I play in  EU Nordic & East
I have bought RP for 43,83 Euro and i don´t have got them, if i try buy more it says * Maximum number tryagain in 24 hours* and i have tryed but it still not work i have waited in 3 days now and i still not get it so, when can i get my RP for 43,83 Euro?

replies.body: I'm not currently seeing any payments being sent, so there's a chance that first attempt wasn't able to go through either. Go ahead and reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case though to make sure nothing went wrong!
